page.title: 07LOCAL NEWS
page.content: {LOCAL NEWS In Pershore parking is free, but { {Wychavon Council}are trying to change this rule, to make every car pay for admission. Many people are with the council, but tourists who "pop in" to have a look at the Abbey and shops etc would rather not pay! Teachers are on strike. They demand more pay, this has disrupted local schools. Fruit growers in the area are worried about the poor weather. {Record heavy} {rain}and little sunshine have combined to threaten the strawberry and plum crops. The Friday night television serial "The Mad Death" made people think about{RABIES.}This disease has not been seen in this country and as yet there is no known antidote.
